channel.title: How to Make 100% Cornucopia (Espeon)

item.title: How to Make 100% Cornucopia (Espeon)
item.dc:creator: @evil_ubnub evil ubnub
item.description:
@evil_ubnub wrote:

first go to your Item select.java open it Scroll Down some To wear case 385: p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You eat the shark."); p.requestAnim(829, 0); Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 385, itemSlot, 1); p.updateHP(20, true); p.eatDelay = 3; break;

[/b]]then Under Break Add this

case 14538: p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You Click the cornucopia And get Your Food."); p.requestAnim(829, 0); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 14537, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 3144, 5); Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 14538, itemSlot, 1); p.eatDelay = 1; break;

Once You Have Done that Save And Close Then Go to Item On Item Open it And add this

if (itemUsed == 3144 && usedWith == 14537) { pi.deleteItem(player, itemUsed, pi.getItemSlot(player, itemUsed), 5); pi.deleteItem(player, usedWith, pi.getItemSlot(player, usedWith), 1); pi.addItem(player, 14538, 1); player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "You Have Stored 5 karambwans!."); }

Make Sure U put it In right or u well get errors

Well Save And Compile Thanks if u added it

this is for 508 525 loaders (espeon)

Read full topic
